price: 18. Les ‘Ad crièrent au mensonge. Quels ne furent alors Mon Supplice et Mes Menaces !
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
